title: Rune Pages
body:
When going into the shop under gameplay, all the runes are there but not the individual rune pages to buy..

{{champion:84}}  rip; ffs

replies.body: When looking at the runes, their should be a filter setting to the left that says "Tiers." Click that and then select "Show All" and the rune pages should show up.
Thanks so much I've been wondering for 2 days where they went....

As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, this is likely caused by the sorting for *tiers* on the left side of the **Gameplay** section. Make sure it all lists **Show All**. Below is a picture to help visually:

(Click to Enlarge)

https://imgur.com/a/Voa4j

Let me know if you have any questions.
